title: Understanding the Row Insertion
text: To insert a row, you need to interact with the row headings. Think about what options are available when you right-click on a row heading.

title: Exploring the Shortcut Menu
text: When you right-click on the row headings, a shortcut menu appears. What options do you see that might help you insert a row?

hintAnswer: $$Right-click$$ the row headings, click insert on the shortcut menu
title: Using the Shortcut Menu
text: Right-click the row headings, then select the appropriate option from the shortcut menu to insert a row.
choices: $$Right-click$$ the row headings, click insert on the shortcut menu
click the row, then press insert
click any cell in the row, then click insert
